html:
holy people. The sanctified ones, specifically those worthy of attending the temple, are the holy people (61:6).

redeemed of the Lord. Those for whom the Lord has paid the debt of justice for their sins are the redeemed of the Lord (35:10; 51:11).

Sought out. Zion is populated by those whom the Lord has sought out and gathered to himself (Ezek. 34:11; John 1:43; 9:35).

not forsaken. See commentary on 62:4.
